mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (order_detail_number, product_number, product_name, product_count, product_price, user_id, order_date, order_detail_status, refund_check) VALUES (order_detail_seq.nextval, #{product_number}, #{product_name}, #{product_count}, #{product_price}, #{user_id}, sysdate, '준비중', 0)
INSERT INTO user_order (order_number, order_date, user_id, order_detail_number) VALUES (#{order_number}, sysdate, #{user_id}, order_detail_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: SELECT order_number, product_name FROM ( SELECT u.user_id AS user_id,u.order_number AS order_number, p.product_name AS product_name FROM user_order u, order_detail o, product p WHERE u.order_detail_number = o.order_detail_number AND o.product_number=p.product_number ) WHERE user_id=#{user_id}

SELECT order_number, product_name, order_date, order_detail_status, user_name, product_price FROM ( SELECT uo.user_id AS user_id, uo.order_number AS order_number,p.product_name AS product_name, uo.order_date AS order_date, o.order_detail_status AS order_detail_status, ui.user_name AS user_name, o.product_price AS product_price FROM user_order uo, order_detail o, product p, user_info ui WHERE uo.order_detail_number=o.order_detail_number AND o.product_number=p.product_number AND uo.user_id = ui.user_id) WHERE order_number=#{order_number}

SELECT order_number, order_date, product_count, user_id, product_name, product_price, order_detail_status FROM ( SELECT u.order_number order_number, u.order_date order_date, o.product_count product_count, u.user_id user_id, p.product_name product_name, o.product_price product_price, o.order_detail_status order_detail_status FROM user_order u, order_detail o, product p WHERE u.order_detail_number = o.order_detail_number AND o.product_number=p.product_number ) ORDER BY order_date DESC
